name: Building Up My Virgin Boy
description:
Let's building up dull your boyfriend.
280 over special voice recording!!
CV: Yusuke Shirai

---------------------------------
◇Story
---------------------------------

Meeting your soul mate at college. But he is dull....
Um... Look closely, his face is nice...??

Actually, He has not had a girlfriend so far.
I will change... you! You are a diamond in the rough.

Thus began the replanning my boyfriend.

But…when I realized...
I am so into my boyfriend..!!!

---------------------------------
◇CV
---------------------------------
Yusuke Shirai
（Cute High Earth Defense Club Love!（Io Naruko) /A3!（Masumi Usui) / Idolish7（Yamato Nikaido ）/Idol master SideM（Haruna Wakazato）etc..）

---------------------------------
◇How to play
---------------------------------
・You should to hear his story and Let's save an experience point.

・There is a choice in this story.
He become happy due to your decision.To select carefully.

・If you all charactor play, you can read special story!
You can listen to romance voice!
